testsuite.name: Account

testcase.name: User is on the Log in page
The user clicks on the Login option
and enters valid username and password
clicks on the Login button and logs in to his account
user goes to the sales page
The user clicks on My Account option
and updates his first name on his account
The user makes the Ludwig II pen his favorite
and the user Logs Out of his account
